message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for an exclusive price of $150. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll find it appealing.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the exclusivity, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere within my budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $120?
I understand your position, Bob. To reach a fair agreement, I would like to propose a price of $140 for the product. I believe this offers a good balance between value and affordability.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am unable to meet at $140. Would you be open to discussing a price closer to my maximum limit of $120?
